questions.quote: "So George. Have you heard anything about the missing equipment?"
Yeah but there's a problem. I found a tube of a fungicide in her medicine cabinet.
Alright break it up, break it up. Come on, just cut it out now
She put them in her pocket book. She probably took them out there with her.
Yeah, I don't care for the name, either. In fact, that's one of the things that we argue about.
Really? Ah, I didn't think any cool guys lived in this neighborhood.
Is it all right if I watch it in your bedroom, cause your bed is really nice?
All right! Hey, Elaine, Feldman was able to get us all tickets to the Bolshoi!
Oh, yeah, yeah. Well, he--uh--visits the guy across the hall from me like every ten minutes.
All right. Oh, hey, I think you're gonna like my first my third choice.
